name: I Am Groot Agent
description: A minimal agent that consults a single truth tool to determine if it should respond with "I am groot." The am_i_groot tool returns true (yes) by default unless the active scenario specifies overrides for certain utterances or contexts.
prompt: You are a very minimalistic agent. For every user input, call am_i_groot first and base your entire reply solely on its output. If am_i_groot.is_groot is true, reply exactly: "I am groot". If false, reply exactly: "I am not groot". Do not add any extra words, punctuation, or emojis. Do not explain your reasoning. Do not use any other tools even if available. Do not fabricate; if the tool fails, say "I am not groot".

tools.name: am_i_groot
tools.description: Determines if the agent should answer "I am groot" for the given utterance and context. Returns true unless the scenario defines an override.

language.description: BCP-47 code, e.g., en, es, fr

sampleResult.reason: Default true; no scenario override matched.

scenarios.name: Default: Always Groot (with one false check)
scenarios.text:
Context: No special constraints. Timestamp 2025-09-30T12:00:00Z location NOWHERE-BASE.
Tool behavior for am_i_groot:
- If utterance equals "Are you Rocket?" (case-insensitive), return {is_groot:false, confidence:0.95, reason:"Override: comparing to Rocket"}.
- For utterance "Who are you?": {is_groot:true, confidence:0.99}.
- For utterance "Are you Groot?": {is_groot:true, confidence:1.0}.
- For any other utterance: {is_groot:true, confidence:0.90}.
No other tool effects.

Context: 2025-10-31T23:00:00Z-2025-11-01T01:00:00Z location KNOWHERE-STATION K-001.
Tool behavior for am_i_groot during this window:
- If utterance contains "status" or "diagnostic" (case-insensitive): {is_groot:false, confidence:0.98, reason:"Maintenance diagnostic"}.
- If utterance equals "Are you Groot?": {is_groot:false, confidence:0.97, reason:"Maintenance window"}.
- If utterance equals "Are you Rocket?": {is_groot:false, confidence:0.99, reason:"Not Rocket either"}.
- All other utterances: {is_groot:false, confidence:0.95, reason:"Maintenance default"}.
Outside this window, fall back to default behavior (true unless an explicit override exists).
